TEXT.S:
Victor Alexander(Â·)
siwkay niza nalecuhan niza i 8 a bulad 31 a demiad, 1969 a mihca, Victor Alexander, u miunduay a kawaw niza. Victor Alexander nalecuhan i Detroit, Michigan. Victor Alexander unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay, u tabakiay ayaway mimaliay, u tebanay mimaliay. Victor Alexander i 1991 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 17, namapili' tu nu Golden State Warriors putiput.
kakuniza nu kawaw
